The Xenoforce sorround D-13 by all side."The battle is over jerk!" 
said Siref by pointing his gun toward him.Each member of the team 
point their laser at him waiting for the signal to shoot.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Skyburst::
> 
> He dropped quickly, avoiding the shots. He then flew at D-13. When 
he
> was close enough, he slashed at D-13 with his spinning propeller 
shield.
